languages.text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//
languages.original_text:
Один раз за битву Вольный Торговец может выбрать союзника (или самого себя) и увеличить все {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} выбранной цели на +20 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. По окончанию действия этого {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} цель будет {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик -//

traits.locale_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 bonus to all their characteristics for 2 rounds. After the effect fades the target becomes prone.{br}
<align="center"> ///Hereticus — Radical -//

Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 bonus to all their characteristics for 2 rounds. After the effect fades, the target falls prone.{br}
<align="center"> ///Hereticus — Radical -//

Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

languages.text:
Один раз за битву Вольный Торговец может выбрать союзника (или самого себя) и увеличить все {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} выбранной цели на +20 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. По окончанию действия этого {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} цель будет {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик -//

Einmal pro Gefecht kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Verbündeten auswählen (einschließlich sich selbst) und ihm 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} gewähren. Nachdem der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} verschwunden ist, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Fanatiker -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
Einmal pro Gefecht kann der Freihändler einen Verbündeten auswählen (einschließlich sich selbst) und ihm einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 auf alle Eigenschaften gewähren, und zwar 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}Runden{/g} lang. Nachdem der Effekt verschwunden ist, wird das Ziel hingestreckt.{br}
///Haereticus — Radikaler -//

languages.text:
Une fois par bataille, le libre-marchand peut choisir un allié (y compris lui-même) et attribuer un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +20 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} se dissipe, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Fanatique -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
Une fois par bataille, le Libre-Marchand peut choisir un allié (y compris lui-même) et attribuer un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +20 à toutes ses caractéristiques pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Lorsque l'effet se dissipe, la cible est immobilisée.{br}
///Hereticus — Radical -//

languages.text:
每场战斗中，行商浪人可以选择一名盟友（包括行商浪人本人），使该名盟友所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高20点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}失效之后，目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——激进者 -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
每场战斗中，行商浪人可以选择一名盟友（包括行商浪人本人），使该名盟友所有属性提高20点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此效果结束后，目标会陷入俯卧状态。{br}
///异端主义——激进者 -//

每场战斗中，行商浪人可以选择一名盟友（包括行商浪人本人），使该名盟友所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高20点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}失效之后，目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——激进者 -//

languages.text:
Una vez por combate, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede elegir a un aliado (incluyéndose a sí mism{mf|o|a}) y otorgarle una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Al terminar el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Ferviente -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

Una vez por combate, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede elegir a un aliado (incluyéndose a sí mism{mf|o|a}) y otorgarle una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 a todas las características durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}asaltos{/g}. Al terminar el efecto, el objetivo queda derribado.{br}
///Hereticus: Radical//

languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
戦闘ごとに一度だけ、ローグトレーダーは味方（自身を含む）を1人選び、2{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その全能力に+20の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。この効果が終了すると、ターゲットは脆弱化状態になる。{br}
///異端者 ― 過激派-//

languages.text:
Hür Tacir, her çatışmada bir kez bir dost birim (kendisi de dâhil) seçip tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırabilir. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Etki{/g} kaybolduktan sonra hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Fanatik -//

Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves) and grant them a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} fades, the target falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.{br}
